entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kangirsuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -36.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangirsuk Airport 11:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -36.6°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -40.2°C
Wind: N 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow beginning overnight. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill minus 53 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the morning then clearing. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 46 in the evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
